description: This file defines a LightningJS component called 'Loader' that displays animated circles as a loading indicator. It imports the LightningJS 'Blits' library, creates a component with a template for animated circles, and includes methods to control the animation state.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component that displays animated circles as a loading indicator.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts the loading animation by toggling the alpha value periodically.
